name: Cyberscape
description:
The robots are trying to take over!

Features

Heroes
Unlock and play as different heroes, each with their own distinct abilities and playstyles that help slay all the bots in sight.



Items
Acquire items from vending machines to boost your robot dismantling potential. Unlock new items by completing various achievements.


Enemies
Face off against the robot army! Watch out as they tend to overwhelm anyone in their path.


Bosses
Face the leaders of the robot army head on by surviving and destroying all the bots before.

Locations
Travel to different locations and stop the robots and their evil plan. Fight your way through the relentless rounds of robots, defeat the boss and escape, or continue to see how long you can survive.

Become Powerful
Level up and unlock all the Cybernetic Enhancements and become the ultimate robot killing machine.
